titleStmt.title: A catechisme of the severall heads of Christian religion, gathered together in question and answer, it being intended onely for private use, but now published for the good and benefit of others, by the importunitie of some friends. By Dorothy Burch, living at Stroud in Kent.
titleStmt.author: Burch, Dorothy.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Matthew Simmons for John Hancock in Popes-head-Alley,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A short catechisme of Christian religion.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
